languages.text: "Я составил план ремонта критических систем в порядке приоритетности, но во многих отсеках царят хаос и беспорядки, затрудняющие работы — люди устрашены и ждут смерти. К тому же некоторые палубы превратились в ловушки, и время запертых там членов экипажа истекает — оптимальная стратегия выживания корабля, увы, не подразумевает выживания этих бедолаг".

"I've already put together a priority order for the repairs of the critical systems, but many bays have descended into bedlam and riots, making the work difficult. People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."
languages.original_text: "Я составил план ремонта критических систем в порядке приоритетности, но во многих отсеках царят хаос и беспорядки, затрудняющие работы — люди устрашены и ждут смерти. К тому же некоторые палубы превратились в ловушки, и время запертых там членов экипажа истекает — оптимальная стратегия выживания корабля, увы, не подразумевает выживания этих бедолаг".

traits.locale_text: "I have made plans to repair critical systems, but many compartments have become chaotic and disorderly, making work difficult. People are terrified and waiting to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible, and the time of the trapped crew members is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not entail the survival of these poor souls."

In addition, some decks have become inaccessible, and the time of the trapped crew members is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not entail the survival of these poor souls."

In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of these poor souls."

Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of these poor souls."

People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."

"I've already put together a priority order for the repairs of the critical systems, but many bays have descended into bedlam and riots, making the work difficult. People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."

languages.text: «Ya he preparado un orden de prioridad para las reparaciones de sistemas críticos, pero varias de las bahías están descontroladas y son presa de disturbios, lo que dificulta el trabajo. La gente está aterrada y cree que va a morir. Además, algunas cubiertas han quedado inaccesibles. El tiempo de los tripulantes se acaba. Lamentablemente, la estrategia óptima de supervivencia para la nave no incluye salvar a esos desdichados».
languages.original_text: "I've already put together a priority order for the repairs of the critical systems, but many bays have descended into bedlam and riots, making the work difficult. People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."

traits.locale_text: «Ya he preparado un orden de prioridad para las reparaciones de sistemas críticos, pero varias de las bahías están descontroladas y son presa de disturbios, lo que dificulta el trabajo. La gente está aterrada y cree que va a morir. Además, algunas cubiertas han quedado inaccesibles. El tiempo de los tripulantes se acaba. Lamentablemente, la estrategia óptima de supervivencia para la nave no incluye salvar a esos desdichados».

languages.text: 「すでに重要システムの修理優先順位をまとめましたが、多くのベイが大混乱と暴動に巻き込まれていて、作業は難航しています。人々は恐怖を感じ、差し迫る死に怯えています。加えて、一部のデッキはアクセスできない状態です。閉じ込められたクルーたちに残された時間は多くありません。悲しいですが、この船の最適な生存戦略からは、可哀そうなあの者たちの生存確率は除外しています」
languages.original_text: "I've already put together a priority order for the repairs of the critical systems, but many bays have descended into bedlam and riots, making the work difficult. People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."

traits.locale_text: 「すでに重要システムの修理優先順位をまとめましたが、多くのベイが大混乱と暴動に巻き込まれていて、作業は難航しています。人々は恐怖を感じ、差し迫る死に怯えています。加えて、一部のデッキはアクセスできない状態です。閉じ込められたクルーたちに残された時間は多くありません。悲しいですが、この船の最適な生存戦略からは、可哀そうなあの者たちの生存確率は除外しています」

languages.text: “我已经制定了修复关键系统的优先顺序，但许多甲板已经陷入了骚乱状态，修复工作非常困难。所有人都吓坏了，觉得自己要死了。另外，一部分甲板已经无法通行。受困船员剩下的时间不多了，但遗憾的是，对这艘船而言，最有效的抢修策略并不包括救援那些不幸的船员。”
languages.original_text: "I've already put together a priority order for the repairs of the critical systems, but many bays have descended into bedlam and riots, making the work difficult. People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."

traits.locale_text: “我已经制定了修复关键系统的优先顺序，但许多甲板已经陷入了骚乱状态，修复工作非常困难。所有人都吓坏了，觉得自己要死了。另外，一部分甲板已经无法通行。受困船员剩下的时间不多了，但遗憾的是，对这艘船而言，最有效的抢修策略并不包括救援那些不幸的船员。”

languages.text: "Ich habe bereits angeordnet, die kritischen Systeme mit höchster Priorität zu reparieren. In vielen Modulen herrscht jedoch das Chaos und es sind Aufstände ausgebrochen, was die Arbeit erschwert. Die Leute sind verängstigt und glauben, sie würden sterben. Darüber hinaus sind einige Decks nicht zugänglich. Den Crewmitgliedern, die dort festsitzen, rennt die Zeit davon. Bedauerlicherweise beinhaltet die optimale Überlebensstrategie für das Schiff nicht das Überleben dieser armen Seelen."
languages.original_text: "I've already put together a priority order for the repairs of the critical systems, but many bays have descended into bedlam and riots, making the work difficult. People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe bereits angeordnet, die kritischen Systeme mit höchster Priorität zu reparieren. In vielen Modulen herrscht jedoch das Chaos und es sind Aufstände ausgebrochen, was die Arbeit erschwert. Die Leute sind verängstigt und glauben, sie würden sterben. Darüber hinaus sind einige Decks nicht zugänglich. Den Crewmitgliedern, die dort festsitzen, rennt die Zeit davon. Bedauerlicherweise beinhaltet die optimale Überlebensstrategie für das Schiff nicht das Überleben dieser armen Seelen."

languages.text: « J'ai déjà défini la liste des systèmes critiques à réparer en priorité, mais vu le chaos qui règne dans certains compartiments, la tâche est loin d'être aisée. Les gens sont terrifiés et persuadés que la mort est proche. Pour ne rien arranger, certaines passerelles sont désormais inaccessibles. Pour les membres d'équipage pris au piège, le temps est compté. Malheureusement, si nous voulons sauver le vaisseau, la stratégie optimale n'inclut pas leur survie. »
languages.original_text: "I've already put together a priority order for the repairs of the critical systems, but many bays have descended into bedlam and riots, making the work difficult. People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai déjà défini la liste des systèmes critiques à réparer en priorité, mais vu le chaos qui règne dans certains compartiments, la tâche est loin d'être aisée. Les gens sont terrifiés et persuadés que la mort est proche. Pour ne rien arranger, certaines passerelles sont désormais inaccessibles. Pour les membres d'équipage pris au piège, le temps est compté. Malheureusement, si nous voulons sauver le vaisseau, la stratégie optimale n'inclut pas leur survie. »

languages.text: "Kritik sistemler için bir öncelik sırası belirledim bile ancak birçok bölme, delilik ve isyana sürüklenmiş durumda. Bu da işimizi zorlaştırıyor. İnsanlar dehşete düştü ve ölmek üzere olduklarını düşünüyorlar. Buna ek olarak bazı güverteler erişilmez hâle geldi. Mahsur kalmış mürettebatın zamanı azalıyor. Ne yazık ki geminin optimal hayatta kalma stratejisinin içinde bu zavallıların kurtarılması bulunmuyor."
languages.original_text: "I've already put together a priority order for the repairs of the critical systems, but many bays have descended into bedlam and riots, making the work difficult. People are terrified and think they're about to die. In addition, some decks have become inaccessible. The trapped crew members' time is running out. Sadly, the optimal survival strategy for the vessel does not include the survival of those poor sods."
